title: Parameter Service
description: A service which allows for reading, writing, and notifying about parameters on a device

storage.Description: Handle storing parameter data in RAM, as well as handling reads and writes

maxNotifications.Description: How many notifications the device can handle having enabled at once

accessLevelRequired.Description: A list of the access levels which get access to the parameter service

parameters.Description: A list of the parameters implemented

extendedLabels.Description: A list of the extended parameter labels (for booleans, enumerations, and bitfields) implemented
